overview: The Hotel Blackcat's owner, Mang, never leaves the counter. Guests include the immigrant worker, whore, losing-job Japanese, sex-abused man, little Lolita.... The police forces the Hotel  to shut down and all guests must leave. What should they do? It's not necessary  to lock each room anymore. Keep the door open, you'll find out traces imprinted with figures as well as times.
title: Hotel Blackcat
